notes:
New creature in [[Updates/8.2|Summer Update 2008]]. It can be assumed that he is an [[Elf|Elven]] [[Vampire]] due to the fact he says "Ashari", shoots sniper arrows and dwells in [[Hellgate]], which is extremely close to [[Ab'dendriel]]. 
<noinclude><gallery mode="nolines">
Zevelon Duskbringer.png|Zevelon Duskbringer and the Vampires it spawns with. 
Zevelon Duskbringer.jpg|Zevelon Duskbringer on Shivera
vanlyvestribute.PNG|Zevelon on Refugia
</gallery></noinclude>
sounds: I will be still around when my 'noble' race is gone.
Human blood is not suitable for drinking!
Human blood is a hardly suitable drink.
Your short live is coming to an end.
Ashari Mortals. Come and stay forever!
name: Zevelon Duskbringer
behaviour: Spawns with 0-3 vampires, Goes [[Invisible]] and runs away in low health.
strategy:
Beware if you are low level, because this boss will be fatal for you.
Higher level '''Mages''' should run, heal when he paralyzes you and shoot [[Flame Strike]] and [[Great Fireball|GFBs]] when he goes invisible, so you hurt summoned vampires and boss at the same time and get him visible again.
